name: app-root-path
description: Determine an app's root path from anywhere inside the app

scripts.test: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Chris Morrell <http://cmorrell.com>
